data.name: Dynamic Arms VR
data.detailed_description:
Dynamic Arms VR is a first-person Sci-fi shooter where you utilize transforming weapons, so-called "Dynamic Arms", to fight your way through waves of robot assailants in the arena. Will you make it to the top of the scoreboard or will you face defeat at the hands of your mechanical oppressors

Dynamic Weapons – Adapt the weapon to every scenario


The weapons used in Dynamic Arms VR can be adapted in one way or another to fit your needs in combat.

With the two-handed rifle you can switch firing modes by adjusting the distance between your hands. The further apart they are, the more of a punch your gun packs. The closer they are, the faster you shoot. This is not an all-or-nothing type of deal, if you need something in-between simply position your hands at a medium distance from each other and get the best of both worlds.

Perk system


Before entering the arena, you have a variety of perks to choose from. Perks grant the power to play in your own preferred playstyle adding a bit of extra flavor. Now you can decimate the robot in exciting and powerful new ways.

Challenging scenarios - Give up yet?

The arena offers numerous challenging scenarios, each one has its own unique twist to keep you constantly in the middle of the action. In the arena you advance throughout stages, facing stronger and tougher opponents as you progress.
